title: Vision AI
description: VisionAI is a Flask-based web application that utilizes YOLOv8 for object detection in images, videos, and webcam streams. It also offers dynamic background replacement and image filters like grayscale and Sobel.

title: Ajichri
description: A simple e-commerce website for clothing, providing a user interface for browsing and an admin dashboard for managing users, products, and orders.

title: Engineer Appointment Management
description: A web application that allows clients to schedule appointments with engineers. It includes user management, appointment booking, and interaction tracking.

title: Cinema IDLD
description: Cinema IDLD is an online platform for booking movie tickets. It offers browsing of current and upcoming films, city/cinema selection, seat selection by ticket type, and admin management of content. Authentication is secured via JWT.

title: Medical Recommender
description: An AI-based healthcare project that predicts diseases based on symptoms using a symptom-disease mapping dataset and machine learning techniques.

title: Portfolio
description: An interactive portfolio built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. It showcases my projects, skills, and contact information. This portfolio serves as a showcase of my work in web development and personal projects in Full Stack development and artificial intelligence.
